member.summary: The constructor for the Asset Administration Shell Registry Controller

member.name: M:BaSyx.API.Http.Controllers.AssetAdministrationShellRegistryController.GetAllAssetAdministrationShellDescriptors
member.summary: Retrieves all registered Asset Administration Shells within system (e.g. Station, Line, Plant, Area, etc.) defined by the Registry
member.response: Returns a list of found Asset Administration Shell Descriptors

member.name: M:BaSyx.API.Http.Controllers.AssetAdministrationShellRegistryController.GetAssetAdministrationShellDescriptor(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves a specific Asset Administration Shell registration
member.param: The Asset Administration Shell's unique id
member.response: Returns the requested Asset Administration Shell
No Asset Administration Shell with passed id found

member.name: M:BaSyx.API.Http.Controllers.AssetAdministrationShellRegistryController.RegisterAssetAdministrationShell(System.String,BaSyx.Models.Connectivity.Descriptors.IAssetAdministrationShellDescriptor)
member.summary: Creates a new or updates an existing Asset Administration Shell registration at the Registry
member.param: The Asset Administration Shell's unique id
member.response: The Asset Administration Shell's registration was successfully renewed
The syntax of the passed Asset Administration Shell is not valid or malformed request
No Asset Administration Shell with passed id found

member.name: M:BaSyx.API.Http.Controllers.AssetAdministrationShellRegistryController.UnregisterAssetAdministrationShell(System.String)
member.summary: Deletes the Asset Administration Shell registration from the Registry
member.param: The Asset Administration Shell's unique id
member.response: The Asset Administration Shell was deleted successfully
No Asset Administration Shell with passed id found

member.name: M:BaSyx.API.Http.Controllers.AssetAdministrationShellRegistryController.RegisterSubmodelAtAssetAdministrationShell(System.String,System.String,BaSyx.Models.Connectivity.Descriptors.ISubmodelDescriptor)
member.summary: Creates a new or updates an existing Submodel registration at a specific Asset Administration Shell registered at the Registry
member.param: The Asset Administration Shell's unique id
member.response: The syntax of the passed Submodel is not valid or malformed request
No Asset Administration Shell with passed id found

member.name: M:BaSyx.API.Http.Controllers.AssetAdministrationShellRegistryController.GetSubmodelDescriptorFromAssetAdministrationShell(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves the Submodel registration from a specific Asset Administration Shell registered at the Registry
member.param: The Asset Administration Shell's unique id
member.response: No Asset Administration Shell / Submodel with passed id found

member.name: M:BaSyx.API.Http.Controllers.AssetAdministrationShellRegistryController.DeleteSubmodelDescriptorFromAssetAdministrationShell(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Unregisters the Submodel from a specific Asset Administration Shell registered at the Registry
member.param: The Asset Administration Shell's unique id
member.response: The Submodel Descriptor was successfully unregistered
No Asset Administration Shell / Submodel with passed id found

member.name: M:BaSyx.API.Http.Controllers.AssetAdministrationShellRegistryController.GetAllSubmodelDescriptorsFromAssetAdministrationShell(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves all Submodel registrations from a specific Asset Administration Shell registered at the Registry
member.param: The Asset Administration Shell's unique id
member.response: Returns a list of found Submodels Descriptors
No Asset Administration Shell with passed id found
